Specimen Type: Blood, serum, plasma, urine, or other bodily fluids (as specified by the test order)
Purpose: To generate consistent, accurate, and reliable laboratory results for Miscellaneous Eurofins Viracor tests.
Container: Appropriate container as specified by the individual test order
Equipment: Automated analyzers, manual labware, Eurofins Viracor test kits and reagents, calibrators, controls, and traceable thermometers
